name: @safe-global/api-kit
description: SDK that facilitates the interaction with the Safe Transaction Service API

scripts.test:web3: export TESTS_PATH=tests/endpoint && export ETH_LIB=web3 && nyc --reporter=lcov hardhat test
scripts.test:ethers: export TESTS_PATH=tests/endpoint && export ETH_LIB=ethers && nyc --reporter=lcov hardhat test
scripts.test:viem: export TESTS_PATH=tests/endpoint && export ETH_LIB=viem && nyc --reporter=lcov hardhat test
scripts.test:ci:web3: export TESTS_PATH=tests/e2e && export ETH_LIB=web3 && nyc --reporter=lcov hardhat test
scripts.test:ci:ethers: export TESTS_PATH=tests/e2e && export ETH_LIB=ethers && nyc --reporter=lcov hardhat test
scripts.test:ci:viem: export TESTS_PATH=tests/e2e && export ETH_LIB=viem && nyc --reporter=lcov hardhat test
scripts.build: yarn unbuild && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.build.json

author: Safe (https://safe.global)
